ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

CWE

208

CVE

27208

Attack Surfaces

Cryptographic Algorithm Implementation (MITRE EMB3D PID-11)

private key (MITRE EMB3D PID-12)

Defenses

Protection against SCA in micro-ecc Library, Randomization of the Projective Coordinates in the ECDSA Implementation, Randomize Elliptic Curve Base Point
